question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: 印度尼西亚哥打茂物为何被称为 "雨城"？
answer: 因为哥打茂物全年降雨量大，雨天频繁，所以被称为 "雨城"。
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor is known as the "Rainy City" because of the heavy rainfall and frequent rainy days throughout the year.
